feed.title: Google Cloud: Data Transfer Essentials
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: Data Transfer Essentials

entry.content:
General Availability release of Data Transfer Essentials.

Data Transfer Essentials offers a cost-effective option for data transfer in intra-enterprise applications, while adhering to regulatory requirements.
entry.summary: We are pleased to announce the General Availability release of Data Transfer Essentials. This new offering provides a cost-effective solution for data transfer within enterprise applications, ensuring compliance with regulatory requirements.
entry.title: Announcement: Data Transfer Essentials Now Generally Available
